item.description:
Hi everyone,
Anyone else stuck home Saturday night? Don't stay in alone. Lets hang out at Faneuil Hall Marketplace. We'll meet at Cheers. A couple of us will be waiting at the bar. I will be outside the door at 7:00. We can have a couple of drinks, or poke around inside the marketplace, and maybe get some chowda and an ice cream. Usually there are street performers to entertain us too. Sure beats staying in watching television!

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Saturday Night with friends at Faneuil Hall
